title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 29 September 2016 - XWiki
content:
<xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:11 <vmassol> oh  
13:11 <vmassol> the bot is back  
13:11 <vmassol> so the restart was enough apaprently… weird  
13:11 <vmassol> !search "bot is awesome"  
13:11 <vmassol> haha  
13:11 <vmassol> :)  
13:18 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
13:21 <msmeria> has quit  
13:25 <acotiuga> has quit  
13:26 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
13:29 <vmassol> evalica: might be better to use your username on xwiki.org when you make changes  
13:29 <vmassol> (hard to know that chocolade is you :))  
13:29 <evalica> I am using the normal user for the playground - and sometimes I forget :)  
13:29 <vmassol> :)  
13:30 <evalica> there are 2 more "milestone" occurence on the Practices page  
13:30 <vmassol> I know  
13:30 <evalica> :)  
13:30 <vmassol> they're there oin purpose  
13:30 <vmassol> \*on  
13:30 <evalica> k :)

15:06 <msmeria1> has quit  
15:50 <acotiuga> has quit  
16:21 <vmassol> tmortagne: I'm about to fix http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13706?focusedCommentId=92784&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-92784 Please let me know if you had any special reason to remove this feature. Thanks  
16:24 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: wrong since at https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/compare/692f0c526d4e...d11237796e93#diff-969e866750907f414b75a9e8b2ded49bR43  
16:25 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: it's a complex change for 7.4.x  
16:25 <vmassol> hope you're sure of yourself :)  
16:25 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: and https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/compare/692f0c526d4e...d11237796e93#diff-969e866750907f414b75a9e8b2ded49bR135 doesn't look good  
16:26 <vmassol> (doesn't seem a good practice at all to me)  
16:31 <vmassol> tmortagne: committing, I'll revert if need be  
16:36 <vmassol> nice timing for the BFD Denis :)  
16:37 <vmassol> we fixed a lot of blockers/critical today!  
16:37 <Denis> indeed, nice timing  
16:38 <gdelhumeau> hmm indeed, sorry for the since  
16:39 <vmassol> the since is a detail. I'm more worried about the risk for 7.4.x and even 8.2.x  
16:39 <vmassol> (and the ugly try/catch needs to be reviewed too)  
16:42 <tmortagne> vmassol: don't remember  
16:42 <vmassol> ok then my change should be good then  
16:43 <gdelhumeau> I've removed the try/catch  
16:44 <vmassol> be careful because if the guy had put it  
16:44 <vmassol> like forgetting to check for null somrwhere  
16:44 <vmassol> (gdelhumeau)  
16:44 <gdelhumeau> yes, I'm checking the object  
16:45 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
16:45 <vmassol> k, so you think it's a safe change?  
16:45 <vmassol> otherwise be prepared to re-release 7.4.6, 8.2.2, 8.3 and 8.4 :)  
16:46 <vmassol> (I'm always worried when introducing new urls)  
16:46 <vmassol> (new action in this case)  
16:47 <vmassol> (new urls used by old code)  
16:47 <vmassol> (new url used by new code is not a problem)  
16:51 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
16:52 <gdelhumeau> if you prefer I revert the backporting  
17:00 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
17:01 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: see last commit. if yoy like it, I backport it  
17:02 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: I don't prefer anything. You're the owner of it and I haven't analyzed it enough to know th erisk it represnets. I'm just asking you since I see quite a lot of code, code not done by an experienced xwiki dev, and for a fix that is not a blocker for LTS IMO. I'll let you take the decision  
17:29 <gdelhumeau> When I read the code, and when I test it (with different users on diffent wikis), it seems quite safe  
17:29 <gdelhumeau> However, side effects always come from places we never think about  
17:30 <gdelhumeau> so, as you said, since it's not a blocker, I can let it for 8.4 only and let community/professional testers comfort this fix  
17:34 <vmassol> yes a good strategy is to have it on master, wait a bit to make sure it's ok and then backport if need be  
17:34 <vmassol> (unless you're sure of yourself)  
17:54 <mflorea> has quit

19:05 <vmassol> hmm  
19:05 <vmassol> ah yes  
19:05 <vmassol> forget it  
19:06 <vmassol> :)  
19:06 <vmassol> still trying to figure out hte prolem...  
19:08 <vmassol> seems we have a problem on our ci  
19:08 <vmassol> [ERROR] Failed to execute goal on project xwiki-platform-rendering-macro-context: Could not resolve dependencies for project org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-rendering-macro-context:jar:8.4-SNAPSHOT: The following artifacts could not be resolved: org.xwiki.rendering:xwiki-rendering-syntax-event:jar:8.4-SNAPSHOT, org.xwiki.rendering:xwiki-rendering-test:jar:8.4-SNAPSHOT  
19:08 <vmassol> (when I execute locally)  
19:09 <vmassol> hmm that should work fine  
19:09 <vmassol> I see that the CI has built it  
19:09 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-rendering/org.xwiki.rendering$xwiki-rendering-syntax-event/910/console  
19:10 <vmassol> forcing with )U  
19:10 <vmassol> -U  
19:10 <vmassol> same problem  
19:10 <vmassol> checking maven repo  
19:11 <vmassol> hmm seems ok : http://maven.xwiki.org/snapshots/org/xwiki/rendering/xwiki-rendering-syntax-event/8.4-SNAPSHOT/  
19:12 <vmassol> what.????  
19:12 <vmassol> http://nexus.xwiki.org/nexus/content/groups/public-snapshots/org/xwiki/rendering/ is empty for me  
19:13 <vmassol> so it seems we have a nexus problem  
19:13 <vmassol> checking nexus logs  
19:13 <vmassol> found it  
19:13 <vmassol> java.lang.IllegalStateException: java.io.IOException: No space left on device
